name: Business partnership inquiry
description: Legitimate business inquiry for Matt - should route to instructor

trigger.subject: Conference speaking opportunity
trigger.body:
Hi Matt,

I'm the organizer of TypeScript Conf 2025. We'd love to have you as a keynote speaker at our conference in San Francisco this September.

We have a speaker budget of $5,000 plus travel and accommodation.

Would you be interested in discussing this?

Best,
Sarah
TypeScript Conf 2025
